text: :This is an incomplete list of holidays in the Comoros *January 1: New Year's Day *March 18: Cheikh Al Maarouf Day *May 1: Labour Day *July 6: National Day *November 12: Maore Day == Movable holidays == * Eid al-Fitr * Eid al-Adha * Islamic New Year * The Prophet's Birthday * The Prophet's Ascension Comoros Category:Comorian society Category:Comorian culture
title: Public holidays in the Comoros
